summary: THIS IS A MERCEDES SPRINTER WITH A FREIGHTLINER NAME PLATE.  ON SEVERAL OCCASIONS THE VAN WILL NOT START. THIS IS NOT A UNCOMMON PROBLEM FOR THIS SPRINTER .  IT IS THE TOPIC OF MANY INTERNET CHAT BOARDS.  I HAVE TAKEN IT TO A SPRINTER DEALER AND THEY CAN'T FIND THE PROBLEM BUT IT CONTINUES TO INTERMITTENTLY NOT START.  I BELIEVE MERCEDES KNOWS ABOUT THE PROBLEM BUT REFUSES TO ACKNOWLEDGE IT.  *TR
